body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Depot. My name is Terry Diaz. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated as I was told you had a certain car model in stock, but it's not there.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please provide me with the specific car model you were looking for and your phone number so I can investigate this issue further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was looking for the Toyota Camry LE and my number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. Can you also provide me with your email address and home address so we can keep in touch with updates on the inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My email is diana.edwards@example.com and my home address is eight zero zero Elm Street, Parksville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. I will look into the availability of the Toyota Camry LE for you. I appreciate your patience, Diana.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us, Diana. Have a wonderful day!
